label: dog
caption: Two playful dogs, one brown and black and the other white, are engaged in a lively game of roughhousing on their owner's plush carpet, their tails wagging excitedly as they tumble and roll across the floor together. The brown dog's fur stands on end as he pins his white opponent to the ground, but the white dog refuses to give up, nipping playfully at his adversary's ear. As they continue their spirited battle, they leave a trail of scattered toys and tangled fibers in their wake.
